abstract: Dow Jones industrial average rises 22.56 points, or 0.18 percent, to 12,231.11; Standard & Poor's 500-stock index rises less than point, or 0.04 percent, to 1,285.08; Nasdaq composite index falls 1.48 points to 2,737.15.
snippet: U.S. stocks eased after their biggest monthly gain in decades, as some analysts were skeptical that the debt plan would be a long-term solution.
lead_paragraph: U.S. stocks eased after their biggest monthly gain in decades, as some analysts were skeptical that the debt plan would be a long-term solution.

headline.main: Shares Settle After Rally Over European Debt Deal
headline.print_headline: Shares Settle After Rally Over European Debt Deal
